wikipedia_page.main: Bernard Hackett (born 7 September 1933) is an English former professional footballer. He played in The Football League for Chester in the 1950s.

response: * Thomas Bernard Hackett, recipient of the Victoria Cross

He spent two years at Seaman Road but was one of several departures at the end of 1956–57, along with players such as Jack Haines, Bernard Hackett and Jim Collins.Sumner (1997), p 69 He moved to Ashton UnitedSumner (1997), p 135 and later played for Mossley.
